entry.title: ROSEBURG HITS 67 DEGREES TUESDAY – RECORD FOR THE DATE
entry.summary: December 6, 2023 4:20 a.m. Roseburg had a record high temperature for the date on Tuesday. Data from the National Weather Service said the mercury reached 67 degrees at the Roseburg Regional Airport. The previous record for December 5th was 61 degrees, set in 2015. The record propelled Tuesday to now being the 6th warmest...

entry.title: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY FOR MOUNTAIN AREAS
entry.summary: December 6, 2023 3:40 a.m. A Winter Weather Advisory is in effect for mountain areas in southern Oregon from 4:00 p.m. Wednesday through 4:00 a.m. Friday above 3,500 feet. Forecasters at the National Weather Service said snow and blowing snow is expected above 3,500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 21 inches are expected....

entry.title: ODF ANNOUNCES ROSEBURG LOGGING FIRM AS 2023 TOP FOREST OPERATOR
entry.summary: December 6, 2023 3:30 a.m. The Oregon Department of Forestry has announced that Roseburg-based logging firm Plikat Logging Inc. has been chosen as the forest Operator of the Year for Southwest Oregon. entry.title: FOREST SERVICE CHRISTMAS TREE PERMITS STILL AVAILABLE
entry.summary: December 6, 2023 3:20 a.m. The U.S. Forest Service has Christmas Tree permits still available both in-person and online. An Umpqua National Forest release said customers can purchase up to 5 permits per household, at $5 each, through the end of the year. These permits authorize purchasers to cut their own tree(s) on designated Forest...

entry.title: COMMERCIAL DUNGENESS CRAB SEASON BEGINS DECEMBER 16TH
entry.summary: December 6, 2023 3:10 a.m. Oregon’s commercial Dungeness crab fishery opens December 16th from Cape Foulweather just south of Depoe Bay to the California border. entry.title: HOYLE/HUFFMAN INTRODUCE BILL TO EXPAND SMITH RIVER RECREATION AREA
entry.summary: December 6, 2023 2:50 a.m. On Tuesday 4th District Representative Val Hoyle and Representative Jared Huffman of California, introduced the Smith River National Recreation Area Expansion Act. entry.title: Roseburg church to open its doors as cold weather shelter
entry.summary: It looks like unhoused individuals will have a place to get out of the cold this winter, and possibly for years to come, following the announcement that an extreme weather shelter will open on the campus of a Roseburg church.
